div.ab:
بســم الــلّه الرّحــمن الــرّحيــم
أقرّ كل واحد ــپ وكريمة ولدين مطروح الأجير عند شهود
هذا الكتاب وأشهدهم وأشهداهم على أنفسهما في صحّة عقلهما وبدنهما وجواز أمورهــمــا
طائعين أنّهما التسما جميع ما خــلّقته حـــلفته پهما والدتهما نوينه پوپپه اپپه
بن حسن المريسي من رجل وبنات وقنثه وقنية وآلة وآيات وتسلّم كل واحد
جميع حقّه وحصّته على فرائض اللّه عز وجل لتذكّر سبل خط الأثرين ولم يبقا
لواحد منهما قبل صاحبه في جميع ما خلّفته والدتهما تويبة نوينة المتوفّاة عنهما
بمدينة الأشمونيــن قليل ولا كثيــر ولا دعوا ولا طلبة ولا قول ولا حجّة
ولا يمين على جميع الــوجــوه والأسباب كلّها ولم يبقا بينهما شركة في جميع ما خلّفته
والدتهما غير المنزل الّذي خلّفته والدتهما تويبة نوينة بخط حمّام طبري وبرئ كل
واحد منهما من صاحبه بعد أن عرف كل واحد منهما حقّه وحصّته وتسلّمه
وصار في يده وكل دعوا يدّعى بواحد منهما على صاحبه أو يدّعى ذلك له أو أحد
نسبه في حياته أو بعد وفاته باطل دعواه ومن يدّعى له وإفك وعدوان
شهد على إقرار الأخوين المقرّان بعضهما بـبعض بجميع ما فيه بعد أن قرئ عليهما
وأقرّا بفهمه في العشر الأواخر من شهر رمضان سنة اثني عشر وأربع مائة وكتب هذا
الإقرار لحي لحين نسختين بيد كل واحد منهما كتبه حجّة له وعليه شهد على ذلك
شهد محمّد بن يوسف بن طيب على إقرار
الرّجل والمرأة المقرّين بما فيــه في تأريخه
شهد سريج سريج بن علي بن الحسين على إقرارهما بما فيه في تأريخه

hāḏā ăl kitābi wa ʾašhada ʾašhadā hum ʿalà ʾanfusi himā fī ṣiḥḥaẗi ʿaqli himā wa badani himā wa ǧawāzi ʾumūri himā
ṭāʾiʿayni ʾanna humā ĭltasamā ǧamīʿa mā ḫallafat hu bi himā wālidatu humā nuwaynaẗu tuwaybaẗu ĭbnaẗu hudayy:i
bni ḥasan:in ăl marīsiyyi min riǧāl:in wa banāt:in wa qunyaẗ:in wa ʾālaẗ:in wa ʾāyāt:in wa tasallama kullu wāḥid:in
ǧamīʿa ḥaqqi hi wa ḥiṣṣati hi ʿalà farāʾiḍi ăl lāhi ʿazza wa ǧalla li taḏakkuri subula ḫaṭṭi ḫuṭṭi ăl ʾaṯarayni wa lam yabqā
li wāḥid:in min humā qibala ṣāḥibi hi fī ǧamīʿi mā ḫallafat hu wālidatu humā nuwaynaẗu tuwaybaẗu ăl mutawaffāẗu ʿan humā
bi madīnaẗi ăl ʾušmūnayni qalīl:un wa lā kaṯīr:un wa lā daʿw:an wa lā ṭalibaẗ:un wa lā qawl:un wa lā ḥuǧǧaẗ:un
wa lā yamīn:un ʿalà ǧamīʿi ăl wuǧūhi wa ăl ʾasbābi kulli hā wa lam yabqā bayna humā širkaẗ:un fī ǧamīʿi mā ḫallafat hu
wālidatu humā ġayru ăl manzili ăllaḏī ḫallafat hu wālidatu humā nuwaynaẗu tuwaybaẗu bi ḫaṭṭi ḥammāmi ṭabariyy:in wa bariʾa kullu
wāḥid:in min humā min ṣāḥibi hi baʿda ʾan ʿarafa kullu wāḥid:in min humā ḥaqqa hu wa ḥiṣṣata hu wa tasallama hu
wa ṣāra fī yadi hi wa kullu daʿw:an yuddaʿà bi wāḥid:in min humā ʿalà ṣāḥibi hi ʾaw yuddaʿà ḏālika la hu ʾaw ʾaḥadi
nasabi hi fī ḥayāti hi ʾaw baʿda wafāti hi bāṭil:un daʿwā hu wa man yuddaʿà la hu wa ʾifk:un wa ʿudwān:un
šahida ʿalà ʾiqrāri ăl ʾaḫawayni ăl muqirrāni baʿḍi himā bi baʿḍ:in bi ǧamīʿi mā fī hi baʿda ʾan quriʾa ʿalay himā
wa ʾaqarrā bi fahmi hi fī ăl ʿašri ăl ʾawāḫiri min šahri ramaḍāna sanaẗa ĭṯnay ʿašara wa ʾarbaʿi miʾaẗ:in wa kutiba hāḏā
ăl ʾiqrāru lḥy liḥyānu nusḫatayni bi yadi kulli wāḥid:in min humā kataba hu ḥuǧǧaẗ:an la hu wa ʿalay hi šahida ʿalà ḏālika
šahida muḥammadu bnu yūsufa bni ṭīb:in ʿalà ʾiqrāri
ăr raǧuli wa ăl marʾaẗi ăl muqirrayni bi mā fī hi fī taʾrīḫi hi

Au n[om] de Di[eu] clé[ment] et mi[sé]ricor[dieux]! In the na[me] of Go[d], the Compassion[ate], the Me[r]cifu[l].
Both [........... viz. So and So and] Karîma, the two children of Maṭrûḥ, the journeyman, have acknowledged in the presence of the witnesses Chacun des [….] a re[con]nu […. et] Karīma, tout les deux enfants du journalier Maṭrūḥ, en présence des témoins
de ce [document], et [ils pirent à t´moin], étant dans la plénitude de leurs facultés mentales et physiques et leur capacité juridique, of this [deed] having cal[led them to witness as to] their obligation they being in a state of sound mind and body and capable of transacting thei[r] business,
de leur gré, qu’ils ont sollicité tout ce que leur a [l]aissé en héritage leur mère Tuwayba, fille de Huda[yy] voluntarily, [th]at both of them have demanded all that their mother Tuwaiba, daughter of Huda[yy]
b. Ḥasan, originating from Marîs, has left to them of men, maids, goods and chattels, tools and effects, and each of them has taken over Ibn Ḥasan al-Marīsī, comme hommes, filles, biens, outils et objets, et que chacun d’eux a prix
all his portion and share according to the ordinance of God - He is mighty and sublime - (binding himself) to be mindful of the public drinking fountains of the street of the "two monuments"; and there does not remain toute sa portion contingente et sa part, selon les prescriptions de Dieu, il est grand et puissant, (s’engageant) à se souvenir du puits public dans “le Quartier des Deux Monuments”; et il ne reste
à l’un d’eux auprès de son partenaire [en tout] ce que leur mère décédée Tuwayba leur a laissée en héritage for either of them from the side of his partner [in respect to all] that which their mother Tuwaiba, removed from them (by death)
dans la ville d’al-Ušmūnay [n] ni peu, ni [beaucoup], ni (cause d’une) action en justice, ni réclamation, ni d´position, ni acte probant, in the town of al-Ušmûnai[n], had left, little o[r much] or any cause for an action or claim or statement or any means of evidence
ni serment de n’importe quelle manière ou pour n’importe quel motif que ce soit; et il n’est resté entre eux deux aucun bien commun, en tout ce qu’a laissèe en héritage or oath for any causes or reasons whatever, and there does not remain between the two any common ownership in respect to all that which
leur mère, sauf la maison que Tuwayba a laissée en héritage dans “le Quartier du Bain Ṭabarī”. Et chacun their mother has left but the dwellinghouse in the street of Ṭabarî's bath which their mother Tuwaiba has left, and each of them
d’eux a été acquitté par son partenaire, après que chacun a pris connaiccance de sa portion contingente et de sa part, les a prises has released his partner after both of them had taken cognizance of his portion and share and had taken it over
and it had passed into his hand(s). And any action that is brought in by either of them against his partner - be it brought in for him or et est entré en possession de cela. Et chaque plainte que porterait en justice l’un d’eux contre son partenaire, ou que quelqu’un
de sa parenté porterait pour lui durant sa vie ou après sa mort, serait de nulle valeur, peu importe qui la revendiquerait pour lui, et mensonge et action illégitime. for one of his family, during his life or after his death - (then) his action (shall be groundless) and he for whom it had been brought in (shall be) without title, and (the action) a fraud and an unjust proceeding.
Témoins de la reconnaissance des deux frère et soeur qui tous les deux ont reconnu tout ce qui se trouve dans (ce document), après que celui-ci leur a été lu, (Witnesses) have testified to the acknowledgment by the brother and sister who have mutually acknowledged all that (is contained) herein after (it) had been read to both of them,
and they have acknowledged that they have understood it, in the last decade of the month of Ramaḍân of the year four hundred and twelve. And this et qui ont reconnu l’avoir compris dans la dernière décade du mois de Ramaḍān de l’année quatre cent douze, et
acknowledgment has been written ....... by the hand (?) of each of them, who has written it as a proof for him and as to his obligation. (The following witnesses) have testified to it: cette reconnaissance fut écrite en deux copies, une copie de la main de chacund’entre eux deux, comme preuve pour et contre lui: témoins de cela:
A témoigné Muḥammad Ibn Yūsuf Ibn Ṭīb de la reconnaissance Witness is Muḥammad b. Yûsuf b. Ṭîb to the acknowledgment by
de l’homme et de la femme qui ont reconnu ce qui s’[trouve, à] a la date (du document). the man and the woman, who have acknowledged that which (is contained) here[in on] its date.
A témoigné Šurayḥ Ibn ʿAlī Ibn al-Ḥusayn de la reconnaissance des deux de ce qui s’y trouve, à la date (du document). Witness is Šuraiḥ b. ʿAlî b. al-Ḥusain to their acknowledgment respecting that which (is contained) herein on its date.
